attributes.action: reduce the cost for the public to use public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By reducing the cost of travelling by public transport (train, bus etc.) this would encourage more people to use it rather than their car which would be better for both the econonmy and the climate

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/expensivefares/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
